doctitle.textblock: Notice of Open Meeting of the Federal Facilities Environmental Restoration Dialogue Committee

action.textblock: FACA Committee Meeting_Federal Facilities Environmental Restoration Dialogue Committee.

summary.textblock: As required by section 9(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463), we are giving notice of the next meeting of the Federal Facilities Environmental Restoration Dialogue Committee. The meeting is open to the public without advance registration.
The purpose of the meeting is to discuss issues related to enhancing the federal facilities environmental restoration process.

date.textblock: The meeting will be held on January 19, 1994 from 9 a.m. until 6:15 p.m. and on January 20, 1994 from 9 a.m. until 4 p.m.

address.textblock: The meeting will be held at the Hyatt Regency Crystal City, 2799 Jefferson-Davis Highway, Arlington, Virginia.

further.textblock: Anyone needing further information on any aspect of the Federal Facilities Environmental Restoration Dialogue Committee should contact Marilyn Null, Office of Federal Facilities Enforcement, U.S. EPA (Mail Code 2262), 401 M Street, SW., Washington, DC 20460, (202) 260-5686.
